heading: Content Block 1
summary: Pro bono legal help for Ukrainian refugees in Romania and other countries.

heading: Content Block 2
summary: Lawyers for refugeesA campaign by the National Association of the Romanian Bars of free legal and humanitarian assistance for the Ukrainian refugees.Find the list here

heading: Content Block 3
summary: UA.SUPPORTAre you an Ukrainian refugee seeking legal help of any kind?Are you a lawyer willing to offer support to Ukrainian refugees?They will match you!Ask for help

heading: Content Block 4
summary: ACTEDOACTEDO provides legal assistance to refugees for problems such as obtaining refugee status or for resolving various civil or administrative legal issues that they will encounter during their stay in Romania.Ask for help

heading: Content Block 5
summary: Phone list of lawyers from UNHCR who help refugeesUNHCR has compiled a list of phone numbers for lawyers helping refugees. To view the list, scan the QR code.All lawyers speak Romanian.

heading: Content Block 6
summary: Free Legal Counseling for Refugees and Asylum SeekersIn collaboration with UNHCR, CNRR offers complimentary legal counseling to refugees and asylum seekers.If you have any questions or require legal assistance, you can contact CNRR directly through their dedicated hotline: +40730073170. This service is also accessible via WhatsApp, Telegram, and Viber.ðŸ•’ Operating Hours: Monday to Friday, 8:00 AM - 10:00 PM.This service is confidential and aims to provide refugees and asylum seekers with the necessary legal guidance and support.
